wind_farms.description: Barefoot Wind Farm configuration for Scenario A
wind_farms.label: Barefoot Wind Farm

restrictions.description: The wind farm is required to initially curtail its grid export to a maximum of 10.0 MW due to grid upgrade works.
restrictions.label: Temporary grid curtailment

turbines.description: Configuration of WTG01 in Scenario A
turbines.label: WTG01_A

restrictions.comments: The strategy is designed to mitigate against the impact of high ambient turbulence intensity.
restrictions.description: Wind sector management (WSM) curtailment as specifiedby the turbine manufacturer. The power output is limited to 4.5 MW at wind speeds above 18.0 m/s when the wind direction is from between 120.0 and 210.0 degrees.
restrictions.label: WSM curtailment

turbines.label: WTG02_A

restrictions.label: WSM curtailment
